text.name: system_description
text.text: The Lynx was a British 8-bit home computer. Several models were available with 48 kB, 96 kB or 128 kB of RAM. It was possible to reach 192 kB with on-board RAM extensions. The machine was quite advanced for its time.

text.name: system_description
